item.title: A To-Do app in Vlang
item.description: V language, also known as Vlang promises C’s speed, Rust’s safety, Go’s syntax. However, there is only one Vlang book avaiable from Packt and even that is simply listing language features–a mere simpler documentation. In this booklet, I provide a real-world practical example: a command-line to-do app. Audience: Students and enthusiasts who have learned some programming but don’t know what to do next. They taught you to draw shapes, now draw the owl!
